name: Blue Whale Survival Sim 3D
description:
Live a life of the fantastically massive underwater creature – blue whale! Become really mighty and unhurried oceanic animal roaming about the deep sea waters and searching for adventures! Spread your flippers, choose your destination to swim and dip into the life of a real blue whale in Blue Whale Survival Simulator 3D!

Explore fantastically picturesque views of the ocean itself, watch beautiful aquatic plants and seaweed, create your own lair right in the middle of the reef, search for little fish or so-called plankton to feed yourself and try to find your mate to raise a family of magically looking mighty whales! Mind that there are many dangerous creatures at the sea bottom, so be attentive and careful not to be accidentally dead!
Don’t forget to mind your health, hunger and energy indicators – if one of them drops, you may die immediately! Be wise enough not to run into trouble with different sea predator beings like raptorial orca, blood-thirsty shark, monster moray, nimble octopuses and others! Just cute dolphin or slow turtle may become your friends! Swim slowly in the ocean depth expanses, find your mate, lead it to your den and create your wonderful family of little blue whales in Blue Whale Survival Simulator 3D!

Earn points for successfully done missions and unlock different colorful skins for your beautiful whale! Level your characteristics up and become more dexterous, faster and stronger! Be this really amazing creature and enjoy your ocean swimming!

Blue Whale Survival Simulator 3D features:

• Ultimate blue whale survival simulator
• Wide range of different sea monsters to fight with
• Interesting missions to perform
• Colorful skins for your whale
• Amazing 3D graphics

Enjoy the underwater life of a fantastically mighty and beautiful blue whale! Watch beautiful surroundings, fight with different sea predators, find your mate and have fun playing Blue Whale Survival Simulator 3D!
